report_title: Industry Research: Life Coaches in the US
executive_summary: Life coaches provide a discretionary service typically for those who fall on hard times. People need life coaches through difficult economic times, even if services become less affordable. Guidance becomes especially valuable when a significant change occurs, including break ups, personal development, moving, career changes and social upheaval.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: High-Income Earners Continue Driving Solid Performance for Life Coaches
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Life coaching services make up discretionary expenditures, barring lower-income earners from easily using these resources. High-income earners comprise the primary market for life coaches.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: People Shied Away From Expensive Life Coaching in 2020
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: A drop in consumer spending and unemployment in 2020 caused consumers to shy away from discretionary purchases. The high cost of life coaches pushed many middle and lower-income clients to end sessions in 2020.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Life Coaches Benefit From The Economy Forcing Tough Decisions
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The turmoil of COVID-19 helped many appreciate the need for a career change. People left their jobs to find new ones or gain experience and skills. Life coaches guide people through these monumental decisions, leading to a spike in clients in 2021.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Profit Has Increased But Faced Headwinds
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: While sole proprietors make up the bulk of life coaches, larger companies with employees have faced higher wage costs, hindering profit.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Interest in Mental Health from Individuals and Companies Will Support Life Coaches
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Interest in personal life coaching will climb as consumers financially prioritize their physical and mental health.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Technology Complements and Competes with Life Coaches
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Digital life coaching will complement and compete with life coaching.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: MORE LIFE COACHES WILL ENTER THE MARKET AND HEAT THE COMPETITION
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Technology has collapsed many barriers to entry by providing mass marketing platforms.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: GROWTH WILL SLOW ALONGSIDE CHANGING ECONOMIC CONDITIONS
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Lower consumer confidence typically indicates a greater need for coaching services. As woes regarding the outbreak of COVID-19 and inflationary pressures begin to subside, consumer confidence will surge.

industry_definition: This industry includes practitioners that primarily help clients set and achieve personal goals. Such goals can pertain to a client's job, personal life or interpersonal relationships.

negative_impact_factors: Barriers To Entry Level: low - steady

key_trends: Clients shied away from life coaches in 2020 despite considerable turmoil in almost everyone's life.
The International Coaching Federation advocates and provides research reports for coaches.
Career coaching breaks down into leadership training, helping people find work, improving productivity and learning to organize.
Generation X is a boon to life coaches.
Life coaches gravitate toward high-population areas, including the West and Mid-Atlantic, to find potential clients.

market_segmentation.segment_description: According to the ICF, millennials comprise adults born between 1982 and 1996.
Consumers in Generation X include those aged 42 and 58 in 2023.
This age group remains a reliable revenue source for life coaches.

products_and_services.product_description: Personal improvement life coaching incorporates elements from different segments.
Other services include various other forms of coaching.

tier_2_suppliers: Book, Magazine & Newspaper Wholesaling in the US
Office Supply Stores in the US
tier_2_buyers: Business Certification & IT Schools in the US
Testing & Educational Support in the US

regulations_points.regulation_title: Are your sales reliant on the overall health of the US economy?
regulations_points.regulation_description: Although strong economic health allows more consumers to afford life coaching services.
Certification by the ICF represents the benchmark for life coaching certification.
